N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 461.2 - Eligibility

State Regulations
(a) Home-delivered
meals shall be provided only to current recipients of HR and ADC financial
assistance and SSI benefits. (b) Home-delivered meals shall be provided only under the following conditions: (1)
when the recipient is suffering or is
likely to suffer from malnutrition because he lacks the mobility, skills or
incentive to obtain or prepare adequate meals; or
(2)
to enable a recipient to live in his own
home. (c) Services staff
shall determine eligibility for the service. (d) Services staff shall make appropriate
arrangements with providers for delivery of authorized meals. Notes
